author: Peter Konkoly
description: As Peter Konkoly, this cocktail's creator says, it is reminiscent of a Last Word. However, we prefer this tasty drink served on-the-rocks as an aperitif alternative to a Negroni, rather than straight-up as originally specified by Peter.
name: Swiss Watch
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled sugar rimmed glass
